biotools.summary: Software tool providing machine learning approach for identification and classification of CRISPR-Cas systems. Combines regression and classification approaches for improving quality of input protein cassettes and predicting their subtypes.

bioschemas.name: CRISPRcasIdentifier
bioschemas.summary: Software tool providing machine learning approach for identification and classification of CRISPR-Cas systems. Combines regression and classification approaches for improving quality of input protein cassettes and predicting their subtypes.
